# Welcome to the PESTPP Madison Tutorials

Explore groundwater modeling and uncertainty analysis using PESTPP and MODFLOW6. The following tutorials are available:

- [Simple PSTFrom](notebooks/simple_pstfrom.ipynb)
- [Simple IES](notebooks/simple_ies.ipynb)
- [Simple LP Example](notebooks/simple_LP_example.ipynb)

Each notebook is fully executable and includes step-by-step instructions.
